entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Student Loan 2001. Criteria of choosing a bank among Hungarian university and college students.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-F04: TÁRKI Student Loan 2001. Criteria of choosing a bank among Hungarian university and college students.. data sheet. Version: 2007-02-12
entry.dcterms:creator: Sági, Matild
entry.dcterms:description: financing university / college studies, subjective financial situation, citeria for choosing a bank, habits of using bank account, bank factors in applying for student loan
entry.dcterms:subject: economic policy
education, school
social stratification and groupings
person
survey data
cross-section

A simple random sample was selected from universities and colleges in Hungary, then from the selected institutions regular students with bank accounts were asked; the number of interviewed students in an institution was in proportion to their number within the institution.
face-to-face interview
A
